price: Mbele yangu haibadilishwi kauli, wala Mimi siwadhulumu waja wangu.
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
footnotes: Hapana la kugeuza kauli ilioko kwangu na onyo langu kuwatia makafiri Motoni, wala Mimi si Mwenye kuwadhulumu waja. Kwani simuadhibu mja yeyote bila ya makosa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
